https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ixmXVLLM1dkND8SVR2tNFalykOw.jpg A best-selling author hides her love for Christmas after an ugly break up, finding love again when she joins a website for people who are crazy about Christmas: "Christmas Lovers Anonymous". Christmas Lover's Anonymous
